channel.title: SquareOne V0.2
channel.description:
[center][b]This server is based off of czar. I am also a beginner coder and this is my first project. Please be nice.[/b][/center] [center] SquareOne V0.2[/center]
Have you ever wanted one of the cleanest and most "runescapish" czar source ever? Something that's like Deltascape except it isn't actual Delta-Sourced/Leeched/Ripped? And you don't want richscape because of its huge client. Well, here you have it, you're going back to square one.
Info: I am planning on making this a very simple czar server. Starting everything from scratch. This is my first step. I will NOT be adding a client. I think a server should be able to be played on more than 1 client, for it's a drag for many players to have to download a client and then realize the server sucks.
Suggestions are OPEN! I will be updating V 0.3 while I'm at it! :D
[center][b]Features: Npc Dialogue Npcs Attack Back Wilderness Levels (Must be 10 levels apart) Many thanks to Wish[/b][/center] [center] Download Link: http://uppit.com/US3IHU[/center] [center] [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/1ow0sl.jpg[/img][/center]
[center][u]What I've done:
Removed ALL autospawned NPCS except for:
The 2 men at lumberidge Wise Old Man
I suppose you would know how to add more NPCS
All commands have been removed except for:
Some unknown ones and ::home/::info[/u][/center] [center] [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/149xxkk.jpg[/img] [/center]
[b]More info on V 0.3- V1 coming soon...[/b] [center] [center]Credits:
Me 10% Wish 15% Figment 25% Rich 5% Reforced 45%[/center]
And 0.01% to Galkons for letting me use his client xD![/center]

item.title: SquareOne V0.2
item.dc:creator: @irKevin irKevin
item.description:
@irKevin wrote:

[center]This server is based off of czar. I am also a beginner coder and this is my first project. Please be nice.[/center]
[center]
SquareOne V0.2[/center]

Have you ever wanted one of the cleanest and most “runescapish” czar source ever? Something that’s like Deltascape except it isn’t actual Delta-Sourced/Leeched/Ripped? And you don’t want richscape because of its huge client. Well, here you have it, you’re going back to square one.

Info: I am planning on making this a very simple czar server. Starting everything from scratch. This is my first step. I will NOT be adding a client. I think a server should be able to be played on more than 1 client, for it’s a drag for many players to have to download a client and then realize the server sucks.

Suggestions are OPEN! I will be updating V 0.3 while I’m at it!

[center]Features:
Npc Dialogue
Npcs Attack Back
Wilderness Levels (Must be 10 levels apart) Many thanks to Wish[/center]
[center]
Download Link: http://uppit.com/US3IHU[/center]
[center]

[center][u]What I’ve done:

Removed ALL autospawned NPCS except for:

Wise Old Man

I suppose you would know how to add more NPCS

and ::home/::info[/u][/center]
